Author: Sardo - ver. 1.0 - 07.01.2016: Attack: Gi-Barch, 3 sides, Dark Elixir Attack.
Make these Troops: 8-10 Giants, Barb 40%, Arch 60%, Minions optional
Will drop Barb, Arch, All Heroes, CC and use Rage spell if enabled from GUI
